parse

public static Record parse(NdefRecord ndefRecord)
                    throws FormatException
Parse a byte-based NdefRecord into a high-level Record.

Parameters:

Returns:
corresponding Record subclass - UnsupportedRecord is not known.
Throws:
FormatException - if known record type cannot be parsed
